title: Hyperion HFM (Hyperion Financial Management) Sr. Managing Consultant at Resource Spectrum (Dallas, TX)
text: Source: Dice Including the POSITION ID CMTXA-5327c Hyperion HFM (Hyperion Financial Management) Senior Managing Consultant in your email response is CRITICAL to the successful routing of your resume. The successful candidate will have a minimum of six yearsrsquo experience working for a major consultancy or Big Four consulting firm working with the Close, Consolidation, and Financial Reporting space. Preferred skills At least 5 yearsrsquo experience in HFM implementations as a Project Manager, Track Lead or Functional Solution Architect. At least 5 yearsrsquo experience in Analyzing requirements, writing functional specifications, conducting tests, troubleshooting issues, interfacing with business users, preparing for and leading executive workshop. At least 4 yearsrsquo experience in Must have taken a lead role in at least two Full life cycle implementations, (a minimum of 2), of new consolidation process using a formal implementation methodology and the Hyperion Financial Close. At least 4 yearsrsquo experience in Knowledge of traditional process improvement techniques such as business process reengineering and six sigma applied within a HFM implementation is a plus. At least 4 yearsrsquo experience in Product certification from Hyperion Solutions in Hyperion Financial Management. NICE TO HAVE Big 4 or tier two consulting experience. Working with the Close, Consolidation, and Financial Reporting space.
